name: Split Identity
description:
You are not alone. Because your other personality follows you at every step. As fate would have it, you are a fireman and a pyromaniac in one body. Try to live up to both personalities.

Controls: AWSD + Mouse. Hold left mouse button to fire.

Firefox Browser? Go Full-Screen before entering the game. Otherwise your viewing direction will go crazy.

Pro-Tip: Press Q & E for adjusting mouse sensitivity.

Credits:
